description: Import control on cat and dog fur

measure_type.en: If your product contains materials comprising cat or dog fur
measure_type.cy: Os yw'ch cynnyrch yn cynnwys deunyddiau sy'n cynnwys ffwr cath neu gi

sub_text.en: Cats and dogs are considered to be pet animals and therefore it is not acceptable to use their fur or products containing such fur. It is prohibited to trade in goods comprising cat or dog fur.
